item.title: APSB24-62: Security update available for Adobe InDesign
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates for Adobe InDesign. These updates resolve important vulnerabilities that could lead to arbitrary code execution.
Products: Adobe InDesign 2024, Adobe InDesign 2023 Severity: Important
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/indesign/apsb24-62.html
item.author: Adobe Security Team
